items.title: Northwestern hires veteran coach Kelly as OC
items.description: Veteran coach Chip Kelly, who won a national title at Ohio State in 2024 as offensive coordinator, was named OC at Northwestern, the school announced ...

items.title: Sources: Angels restructure rest of Rendon deal
items.description: The Angels and Anthony Rendon have agreed to restructure the remainder of his contract, sources told ESPN.

items.title: Pats' Diggs faces strangulation, assault charges
items.description: Patriots wide receiver Stefon Diggs is facing a felony charge of strangulation and a misdemeanor charge of assault from alleged Dec. 2 incident.

items.title: Cowboys release two-time Pro Bowl CB Diggs
items.description: The Cowboys have released cornerback Trevon Diggs. He will become a free agent if he goes unclaimed on waivers.

items.title: Williams nixes portal talk, declares Bama return
items.description: Alabama wide receiver Ryan Williams intends to return to the team in 2026 despite a bumpy sophomore season.
